chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: PMB is a highly configurable application. Parameters linked to readers, statistical processes, operations of the Z39.50 client can be customized.
Moreover, the administration tab allows multiple database-related functions, like its optimization, or daily PMB operation like user management (librarians).

The administration tab, in addition to its importance, has more screens than any other PMB tab. For this reason, and to facilitate the update of the information presented here, we decided to introduce this guide separately.

sect1.para: PMB is a free library management software. For more information, refer to http://www.sigb.net .

sect1.title: Organization of the Administration Tab
sect1.para: The administration tab has a menu located on the left of the screen, and inside these various menu sections, a links bar is located in top of the screen.
